' Build Dashboard ' Generic server method that takes the name of a dashboard item as a parameter and returns ' chart xml. Called from dashboard.html.
' Load the Dashboard query, getting only the necessary information Dim aml As String = _ "<Item type='Dashboard' action='get' select='background_style,width,height'>" & _ " <name>" & Me.getProperty("DashboardName") & "</name>" & _ " <Relationships>" & _ " <Item type='Dashboard Chart' action='get' select='related_id,x,y'>" & _ " <related_id>" & _ " <Item type='Chart' action='get'>" & _ " <Relationships>" & _ " <Item type='Chart Series' action='get' select='related_id,sort_order,markers'>" & _ " <related_id>" & _ " <Item type='Metric' action='get' select='label,color,pattern,link,stylesheet,method'>" & _ " <Relationships>" & _ " <Item type='Metric Value' action='get' select='sort_order,value,color,link,label,calculate,query,source_id'/>" & _ " </Relationships>" & _ " </Item>" & _ " </related_id>" & _ " </Item>" & _ " </Relationships>" & _ " </Item>" & _ " </related_id>" & _ " </Item>" & _ " </Relationships>" & _ "</Item>"
Dim innovator As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim dashItem As Item = Me.newItem() dashItem.loadAML(aml) ' Run the dashboard query dashItem = dashItem.apply()
' Check for an error or for a lack of Metric Value items (see IR-003972) If (dashItem.isError() OrElse dashItem.dom.selectSingleNode("//Item[@type='Metric Value']") Is Nothing) Then Return innovator.newError(dashItem.getErrorDetail()) End If
' Transform to the chart format Dim chart As Item = Me.newItem() chart.dom.LoadXml(dashItem.applyStylesheet(CCO.Server.MapPath("styles/aml2chart.xsl"),"URL"))
' Check for errors in the chart dom If chart.dom.selectSingleNode("//palette") Is Nothing Then Return innovator.newError("Error building chart setup information") Else Return chart End If
Item.name: Build Dashboard
